entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: The group of followers of Lord Voldemort, mentioned as wanting to harm Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, protected by Dumbledore's magic and his relations.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A person who arranged Harry Potter's future and invoked an ancient magic to protect him.

entities.name: ministry wizards
entities.description: A group of wizards working for the Ministry, mentioned as being present at the Quidditch World Cup.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters want to harm Harry Potter.
Dumbledore invoked an ancient magic to protect Harry Potter.
The Death Eaters were not strong enough to attempt kidnap in the midst of a horde of Ministry wizards.
Harry Potter is protected by Dumbledore's magic.
